idea-plugin.name: JSR
idea-plugin.description: A Small Plugin, providing a GUI for the Java Test Suite Reduction Framework (JSR). This Plugin can be used to analyse your test suite and to identify redundant test cases that slow you down when e.g. executing your regression tests. JSR is able to identify redundant test cases by analysing various coverage metrics of your test suite. Optionally, JSR can disable the identified redundant test cases automatically.
